QuestData.Title: Two By Sea
QuestData.Description: The Forsaken catapults are kicking the snot out of us, $n. And even if we do take care of them, they've two ships with rows of cannons at the ready.$B$BI've a plan to kill two birds with one stone. You're the stone in this plan.$B$BTake out the machinists manning the catapults. After this, use the catapults to launch yourself aboard the Forsaken ships.$B$BIf your aim isn't terrible, you should be able to land safely. Once onboard, go below decks and take care of each ship's captain. Good luck, $c.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Forsaken Catapults to board the Forsaken ships and slay Captain Morris and Captain Anson.
QuestData.RewardText: Well done, $n. You might be a bloody beast, but you're our beast.
